description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

    Features

    TASKS-33162 [Tracking] Provide 'Update Project' functionality.
    TASKS-33544 TASKS-33162 Reschedule Uncompleted Work To Start After Specified Date.
    TASKS-33543 TASKS-33162 Update Project Work As Complete.  

    Enhancements

    TASKS-30437 [Gantt Chart Rendering] Show resources and task links in calendar area.
    TASKS-32490 [Gantt Rendering] Ability to sort tasks by any column in the Gantt view.
    TASKS-32492 [Gantt Rendering] Align contents of cells.
  
    Bugs

    TASKS-33538 Baseline Information is not read by Aspose.Tasks. 	
    TASKS-33550 Cannot read Task.ActualDuration and Task.ActualWork in mpp 2013 properly.
    TASKS-33545 MSP 2013 splits unassigned task and shifts task finish date when setting percent complete.
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET 6.3.0
